fields.summary: HADOOP-19467: [ABFS][FnsOverBlob] Fixing Config Name in Documenatation
fields.description:
There is a typo in config name added as part of fns-blob documentation.
This will fix that typo

   No production code change, no testing needed.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
